name: Earth Crawling MegaWorm
description:
CONTROLS: 

  • WASD to move
  • LEFT CLICK to use slowmotion

GOAL:

You play as a giant worm who wants to reach the center of the Earth.

On your way down, you will have to manoeuvre through a large variety of osbtacles. Be carefull, as your speed increases each second. 

Who knows what you will encounter during your journey ..
